body: I came looking for copper and I found palladium
The only expansive series with a mother-daughter yuri oyako chapter and not a single page of scissoring. Man...

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk *I hope the admins or mods for this site do a purge on these stupid things*

great now I can finally read this without having to look for the others
I’m so confused by this series

is there really NTR though? seems like it's just cheating. Everyone ends up fucking everyone else in the end anyway so there are only brief moments of that heart sinking feeling of betrayal. the daughter gets with the mother like she wanted and Risa's girlfriend gets a sort of revenge by doing a threesome with the two girls she was being cheated on with. everything works out in the end!
